Class.name: Forum.TopicsPage
Class.Description: Page sql.ru/forum/ with topics table Example of page structure see in test/page.html

Property.name: PropertyParse
Property.Description: What properties we need to parse

Parameter.name: URL
Parameter.Description: part of url; Example of url: www.sql.ru/forum/{forum}/{page}

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s ..Forum = $g(forum) s ..Num = $g(num) Quit $$$OK

Method.name: Url
Method.Description: Build url path for current page
Method.Implementation: ..#URL_..Forum_"/"_..Num

Method.name: HtmlGet
Method.Implementation: Q:'$IsObject(..request) "" Q ..request.Data

Method.name: Get
Method.Implementation:
if $g(forum)'="" s ..Forum = forum if $g(num)'="" s ..Num = num
s sc = ..request.Get( ..Url() ) Q:'sc sc
Q 1

Method.name: GetPage
Method.Implementation:
s page = ..%New(forum, num)
s page.request = ##class(Http.Request).%New( ..#SERVER ) s sc = page.Get()
Q page

Method.name: GetPages
Method.Description: Parse pages count from topics page Search line: "Страницы: 1 2 3" And extract data from last available page link
Method.Implementation: s end = html.FindAt( 1, ..#TopicTableEnd ) s begin = html.FindAt( end , "Страницы: " ) s sc = html.MoveTo( begin ) s str = html.ReadLine() ; "Страницы: 1 2 3" s list = $LFS( str,"") ;$lb("2","3") s last = $LG( list, $ll( list ) - 1 ) ;3 s count = $p( last, ">", 2) ;3 Q +count

Method.name: Pages
Method.Implementation: ..GetPages( ..Html )

Method.name: Parse
Method.Description: Move from topic table begin to the end of table

Method.name: topicBegin
Method.Description: found begin of topic in html content
Method.Implementation: s propP = ..PropertyParse if ..pos = 0 { ;first topic begin s ..pos = pos Q 1 } s sc = ..Html.MoveTo( ..pos ), length = pos - ..pos s topicHtml = ..Html.Read( .length ) ;.... s ..pos = pos, ..row = ..row + 1 if ( ..row = 1 ) Q 1 ;first row is table header #; w !, $zcvt(topicHtml,"O","CP1251") ;1251 for Studio Output window /* Example of topic content Важно: Взаимодействие с InterSystems   [new] Шваров Евгений 11 5699 30 июн 15, 13:46 */ s topic( "Mark" ) = ..ParseMark( topicHtml ) ;for topics with mark "Важно: " Q:(topic("Mark")'="")&(..Num>1) 1 ;don't parse topics with mark "Важно: " from >= second page s topic( "ExtId" ) = ..ParseExtId( topicHtml ) s topic( "Views" ) = ..ParseViews( topicHtml ) Q:propP'="All" ..OnTopic( .topic ) ;don't parse all properties if no need for this s topic( "Answers" ) = ..ParseAnswers( topicHtml ) s topic( "Updated" ) = ..ParseUpdated( topicHtml ) s topic( "Type" ) = ..ParseType( topicHtml ) s topic( "Name" ) = ..ParseName( topicHtml ) s sc = ..ParseAuthor( topicHtml, .author ) ;complex object m topic( "Author") = author s topic( "PagesAmount" ) = "a" if $f(topicHtml,"") { s topic( "PagesAmount" ) = ..ParsePagesAmount( topicHtml , topic("ExtId")) } Q ..OnTopic( .topic )

Method.name: ParseMark
Method.Description: Extract mark "Важно: " if it exist in topic's name Важно: Взаимодействие с InterSystems   [new]
Method.Implementation: s mark = $p( topic, "<td class=""postslisttopic"">", 2 ) s mark = $p( mark, "<a href=") s mark = $zstrip( mark, "<>WC" ) Q mark

Method.name: ParsePagesAmount
Method.Implementation: s url = ..#SERVER_..#URL_ExtId_"-" s amount = $p(topic,"<!--end case_ismultipage-->") s amount = $p(amount,url,*) s amount = $p(amount,"/") Q amount

Method.name: ParseType
Method.Description: Extract type from topic html topic
Method.Implementation: s type = $p( topic, "

Method.name: ParseName
Method.Description: Extract name Важно: Взаимодействие с InterSystems   [new]
Method.Implementation: s name = $p( topic, "", 2 ) s name = $p( name, "") s name = $p( name, "") s name = $p( name, ">",2) Q name

Method.name: ParseExtId
Method.Description: Extract topic id from html Важно: Взаимодействие с InterSystems   [new]
Method.Implementation:
s extId = $p( topic, "<td class=""postslisttopic"">", 2 ) s extId = $p( extId, ">") s extId = $p( extId, "<a href=""", 2) s extId = $p( extId, "/", $l(extId,"/") - 1 )
Q extId

Method.name: ParseAuthor
Method.Description: Extract author of topic from html Шваров Евгений
Method.Implementation: k author s author = $lfs(topic,"") if $f( author, "") s name = $p(name,">",2) s name = $zstrip( name, "<>WC" ) s extId =$p(author,"?mid=",2), extId = $p(extId,""">") s author = name, author("ExtId") = extId } else { ;unregistered author s author = $p(author,">",2) s author = $zstrip(author,"<>WC") } Q 1

Method.name: ParseAnswers
Method.Description: Extract posts count from html topic 11
Method.Implementation: s posts = $lfs(topic,"") s posts = $p(posts, ">",2 ) Q +posts

Method.name: ParseViews
Method.Description: Extract posts count from html topic 5699
Method.Implementation: s views = $lfs(topic,"") s views = $p(views, ">",2 ) Q +views

Method.name: ParseUpdated
Method.Description: Extract posts count from html topic 30 июн 15, 13:46
Method.Implementation: s updated = $lfs(topic,"") s updated = $p( updated, ">",2 ) ; 30 июн 15, 13:46 Q ..ParseDate( updated )

Method.name: ParseDate
Method.Description: Convert extracted datetime expression to timestamp value <var> dtexpr </var> - [30 июн 15, 13:46], [вчера], [сегодня]

Method.name: OnTopic
Method.Description: Event handler <var>data</var> - key-value array with topic properties If handler return 0, parsing will be interrupted
Method.Implementation: Q 1

Method.name: Scan
Method.Description: Example scan across all forum topic pages
Method.Implementation: Q 1
